fixed: ## What's Changed
* Fix database migration from 4.3.1 by @Inhishonor in https://github.com/octoshrimpy/quik/pull/622
* Fix the delayed sending icons not disappearing after hitting send by @Inhishonor in https://github.com/octoshrimpy/quik/pull/624
* Add a description to the worker notification by @Inhishonor in https://github.com/octoshrimpy/quik/pull/625
* Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/octoshrimpy/quik/pull/618
* [DOCS] Update F-Droid link by @Cj-Malone in https://github.com/octoshrimpy/quik/pull/626
* Fix search not recognizing special characters by @Inhishonor in https://github.com/octoshrimpy/quik/pull/635
* Fix message content filters not being called by @Truffle2143 in https://github.com/octoshrimpy/quik/pull/636
* Add a dedicated emoji reaction sync progress bar by @Inhishonor in https://github.com/octoshrimpy/quik/pull/640
* Support matching message reactions that are truncated by @Inhishonor in https://github.com/octoshrimpy/quik/pull/642
* Improvements to the worker and message notifications by @Inhishonor in https://github.com/octoshrimpy/quik/pull/647
* Clean up logging by @Inhishonor in https://github.com/octoshrimpy/quik/pull/648
* Add a GH action to validate fastlane metadata by @Inhishonor in https://github.com/octoshrimpy/quik/pull/656
* Set QUIK as a potential default messaging app. by @Inhishonor in https://github.com/octoshrimpy/quik/pull/660
* Fix duplicated messages by @Inhishonor in https://github.com/octoshrimpy/quik/pull/634
* Fix compose activity infinitely loading by @Inhishonor in https://github.com/octoshrimpy/quik/pull/662
* Fix realm migration again by @Inhishonor in https://github.com/octoshrimpy/quik/pull/664
* Update MMS configs by @github-actions[bot] in https://github.com/octoshrimpy/quik/pull/665
* Update release workflow by @Inhishonor in https://github.com/octoshrimpy/quik/pull/666
* Contributing guidelines updates by @Inhishonor in https://github.com/octoshrimpy/quik/pull/667
* Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/octoshrimpy/quik/pull/619
* update readme and contributing by @octoshrimpy in https://github.com/octoshrimpy/quik/pull/671
* Add a deduplicate message feature by @Inhishonor in https://github.com/octoshrimpy/quik/pull/672
* Release v4.3.3 (2235) by @github-actions[bot] in https://github.com/octoshrimpy/quik/pull/673
* Display all reacted emojis by @benwaffle in https://github.com/octoshrimpy/quik/pull/676
* Implement tapping emoji to see who reacted by @benwaffle in https://github.com/octoshrimpy/quik/pull/677
* Improve the release notes generation workflow by @Inhishonor in https://github.com/octoshrimpy/quik/pull/679
* Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/octoshrimpy/quik/pull/680
* Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/octoshrimpy/quik/pull/681
* Move the auto delete old message setting to message management  by @Inhishonor in https://github.com/octoshrimpy/quik/pull/685
* Update the release workflow to use github output, and proper versioning by @Inhishonor in https://github.com/octoshrimpy/quik/pull/693
* Rework the release workflow to be more reliable and to provide an in app changelog by @Inhishonor in https://github.com/octoshrimpy/quik/pull/694
## New Contributors
* @Cj-Malone made their first contribution in https://github.com/octoshrimpy/quik/pull/626
* @Truffle2143 made their first contribution in https://github.com/octoshrimpy/quik/pull/636
